message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you do $17,000?
I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $14,000. Can you consider that?
